column5: Here is what Air Canada gives you as a receipt when you purchase "one extra baggage" for $22.50.  They hand me this and I say "you've got to be kidding me" in a straight face she says " we have to", I say in response " I highly doubt it", she doesn't look pleased.  This has to be 15 feet long
You need the extra bag to carry that thing around with you .
Chad, when they don't look pleased you need to ask for the receipt in triplicate. Two photocopies will do thank you.
When everyone chooses the option to fly other than Air Canada and there's no income for them, maybe they will pay attention.
Half of the 22 bucks is for thermal recipt paper.
Southwest or AMERICAN AIR LINES is all I fly.....

Haha that's what I told the security guy.   I'd hate to see her scowl after that! haha   agreed, but aircan has the most flights per day so i can get to where i'm going on time, versus the other options.   haha, it took up to 4 minutes to print on the old school printer. zzzz. click click. zzzzz.click click.    How is their service from North Bay to Thunder Bay???

I never fly AC. Never had a decent flight crew on any of times I did so I would rather stick a hot poker in my eye than fly with them.  Love Westjet, just wish there were more flight options. Their flight crews are a joy to fly with.    :good:
We always take AC or WJ but I definitely prefer West Jet.
I didn't even know that they made that paper anymore. At least someone still has a good use for it.
